pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Antiseptic Cream 100g
pageProduct.description:
Information

v

General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Antiseptic Cream relieves minor skin inflammation.
• Easily absorbed into the skin
• For grazes and minor skin irritations
• Australia's natural antiseptic

Thursday Plantation Antiseptic Cream captures the antibacterial power of Tea Tree Oil to treat dry or inflamed skin conditions. Contains Australian Tea Tree Oil, Australia’s natural antiseptic.

Suitable For: May assist in the management of minor wounds, cuts, scratches and abrasions.

Size: 100g

Non-Comedogenic?: Yes

Soap-Free?: Yes

PABA Free?: Yes

Skin Type: Combination| Dry| Normal| Oily

Skin Condition: Breakouts

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Gently soothes and relieves minor skin irritations.
• May assist in the management of minor wounds, cuts, scratches and abrasions.
• Suitable for larger areas of the body
• Light and easily absorbed by the skin
• Free from synthetic parabens, mineral oils, petrochemicals, propylene glycol, lauryl sulphates, polysorbates, synthetic fragrances, synthetic colours and animal derived ingredients

Warnings

For external use only. It is recommended you skin patch test prior to use. Discontinue use if sensitivity occurs. If symptoms persist, consult a Healthcare Professional. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use if foil seal at mouth of tube is broken.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Melaleuca Oil 50mg/g.

Directions

Apply liberally to minor wounds, cuts, scratches, abrasions, insect bites and other minor skin irritations.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
